Description:Have you ever wondered what it's like to have your dealer or tuning studio? Now you can find out what it is! Racing game mechanic gives you a unique chance to see what goes on behind the scenes service centers. You have to communicate with customers and repair the car. It will be interesting for all racing maniacs.Features:"Unlimited number of random orders make the gameplay is very
diverse." Hundreds of car parts that can be ordered, to repair and install.
"There will also be a variety of parts (engine, suspension and exhaust system, etc.) chip tuning, intermediate diagnostics.
"There is a career mode, will also free play mode.Features repack:- Game Version - 1.0.5.6
- Do not cut /recodedSupplements:- Youngtimer
- Visual Tuning
- Trader Pack
- PickUp & SUV
